name: Cars and Trucks Puzzle Vocabulary Game for Kids and Toddlers - Education game to Learn Vehicle Vocabulary Words
name_original: Cars and Trucks Puzzle Vocabulary Game for Kids and Toddlers - Education game to Learn Vehicle Vocabulary Words
description: This is a game for studying English vocabulary about vehicles by learning through simple puzzle game which kids , toddlers and preschoolers can play . It is played by dragging vocabularies, or pictures of vehicles to match . This free application is intended to support children learning by using the game as a media to have fun of learning, be able to remember the vocabulary through tablets and smartphones .
